Package zebra4j.util

Interface Randomness

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDKRandom
public interface Randomness
Data randomization, as used in zebra4j

This interface allows implementing the data randomization using different libraries. The built-in implementation is JDKRandom, which uses randomization from the JDK. Users of the library may prefer commons-rng, as in this case.

Some unit tests use a no-op implementation of this interface to be predictable.
